post.description: Creates a new contact or updates an existing one.

email.description: Required. Email address of the contact.

first_name.description: Optional. First name of the contact.

last_name.description: Optional. Last name of the contact.

phone.description: Optional. Phone number of the contact.

foreign_id.description: Optional. Foreign ID to identify the contact in your system.

tags.description: Optional. Array of tags to apply to the contact.

items.description: Optional. Tag values must be strings with max 100 characters.

post.description: Creates new contacts or updates existing ones. Handles multiple contacts in a single request.

tags.description: Optional. Array of tags to apply to all contacts.

items.description: Optional. Tag values must be strings with max 100 characters.

contacts.description: Required. Array of contact objects to upsert.

email.description: Required. Email address of the contact.

first_name.description: Optional. First name of the contact.

last_name.description: Optional. Last name of the contact.

phone.description: Optional. Phone number of the contact.

foreign_id.description: Optional. Foreign ID to identify the contact in your system.

post.description: Unsubscribes a contact by their email address. Can specify an optional reason.

enum: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

post.description: Unsubscribes multiple contacts by their email addresses. Can specify an optional reason.

emails.description: Required. Array of email addresses to unsubscribe.

items.description: Required. Email address must be valid with max 255 characters.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of unsubscribed contacts for the team.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Optional. Number of items per page (default: 50, max: 100).

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Optional. Search term to filter by email address.

post.description: Use this endpoint to ingest custom events.

enum: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

get.description: Use this endpoint to get an event by ID.
Use this endpoint to get decisions for an event.
Returns a paginated list of all webhooks for the team.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Optional. Number of items per page (default: 15, max: 100).

post.description: Creates a new webhook for the team. Webhooks can be enabled or disabled during creation.

url.description: Required. The URL where webhook events will be sent.

is_enabled.description: Optional. Whether the webhook is enabled (default: true).

source.description: Optional. Indicates integration-managed webhooks. Allowed values: n8n, zapier, make, internal.

events.description: Required. Array of event names to subscribe to.

items.description: Required. Event name must be one of the valid webhook events.

delete.description: Permanently deletes a webhook from the team.

patch.description: Allows updating webhook URL, subscribed events, and enabled status.

get.description: Returns a single webhook that belongs to the authenticated team.

post.description: Returns a sample webhook payload for the specified event type.

event.description: Required. The event type to simulate.

enum: Thank you for the email. I have a question about...

get.description: Returns a paginated list of webhook deliveries with optional filtering.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Optional. Number of items per page (default: 15, max: 100).

post.description: Enables a disabled webhook. Checks if the team has reached the maximum of 10 active webhooks.
Disables an enabled webhook. The webhook will no longer receive events.

event_name.description: Required. Name of the event. Must be one of: contact.saved, contact.unsubscribed, lead.created, sale.created

occurred_at.description: Optional. Timestamp when the event occurred. Format: Y-m-d H:i:s (e.g., "2024-01-15 14:30:00")

idempotency_key.description:
Optional. Unique idempotency key to prevent duplicate events. Must be a valid UUID.
For lead.created and sale.created events, this should strictly be the tracking_id value

email.description: Optional. Email address associated with the event. Required if idempotency_key is not provided

payload.description:
Optional. Additional payload data associated with the event.
For sale.created events, it's recommended to include an "amount" key for conversion amount

errors.description: A detailed description of each field that failed validation.
